full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` RJE BTZUN SGROL MA LA BRTEN PA'I BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR BYIN RLABS CHU RGYUN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES RJE BTZUN SGROL MA LA BRTEN PA'I BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR GYI SNYING PO BYIN RLABS CHU RGYUN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GI SLOB MA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG 'OD GSAL RGYAL MTSAN GYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGOR, BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI SLOB BU'I THA SHAL DGE SLONG SKYABS MCHOG BDE CHEN 'OD GSAL GYIS SBYAR BAS KYANG 'GRO KUN RJE BTZUN SGROL MAS RJES SU 'DZIN PAR 'GYUR CIG , ,,)
